name: Soft Skills
description: Soft skills are the traits that make you a good employee. Some of the skills that I accquire was natural and other adapted later. Basically I am a hardworking person who is very much focused on the target acquiring the soft skill shown below.

name: Hard Skills
description: Hard skills are part of the skill set that is required for a job. My hard skills are the result of hard work, determination and self motivation. I acquired those skills through my formal education and self-learning which includes reading documentations,free online courses and hands-on practices. All I have learned, I learned from books.
